EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Your Aircraft's Avionics with HAPP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.execujet.com/en/]]>
Protect Your Aircraft's Avionics with Honeywell's HAPP and ExecuJet Malaysia
Minimize unexpected travel delays and protect your aircraft with Honeywell’s Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/V3I9000GBl0X200QqrLacZ0]]>. Save time and money knowing your aircraft’s avionics are serviced correctly under a program with more than 3,800 aircraft and counting! Experience the difference when you sign up for HAPP with flexible and fixed-rate plans, customized to fit your needs and your budget. Plus, HAPP customers never have to worry about missing a flight with worldwide coverage and an extensive depot of parts updated with the latest reliability modifications while in the repair cycle.
Get HAPP today and receive:
- Free exchange units for customers if the part has failed - Reduced overall maintenance costs - 24/7 emergency support from Honeywell’s Aircraft on Ground (AOG) service - Access to Honeywell’s global dealer network
Learn more about how you can save and protect your aircraft with HAPP today!
CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Execujet_HAPP.html]]>
